description: Provide a formatted response for a request of how much was spent on a particular category or merchant with a given start and end

input_variables.name: sum_total
input_variables.description: The value returned from to format

input_variables.name: filter_item
input_variables.description: The merchant or category the transactions are filtered by

input_variables.name: start_date
input_variables.description: The start of the time period for the transactions

input_variables.name: end_date
input_variables.description: The end of the time period for the transactions
